languages.text: "То был запрет цар{mf|я|ицы} ковчега, мы не в силах нарушить его. С честью служить — вот что гласит Завет. Ткач должен готов быть к любым испытаниям веры. Нам сложно. Но мы верны".

"A prohibition imposed by the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, against which we are powerless. To serve with honour is the rule the Web commands us to follow. A spinner must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But faithful we stay."
languages.original_text: "То был запрет цар{mf|я|ицы} ковчега, мы не в силах нарушить его. С честью служить — вот что гласит Завет. Ткач должен готов быть к любым испытаниям веры. Нам сложно. Но мы верны".

traits.locale_text: "It was a prohibition imposed by the {mf|King|Queen} of the Ark, and we are powerless against it. To serve with honour is the rule Ahn'shini commands us to follow. A Weaver must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But we keep the faith."

"It was a prohibition imposed by the {mf|King|Queen} of the Ark, and we are powerless against it. To serve with honour is the rule Ahn'shini commands us to follow. A Weaver must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But we keep the faith."

"A prohibition imposed by the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, against which we are powerless. To serve with honour is the rule Ahn'shini commands us to follow. A Weaver must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But we keep the faith."

"A prohibition imposed by the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, against which we are powerless. To serve with honour is the rule Ahn'shini commands us to follow. A Weaver must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But we keep the faith."

"A prohibition imposed by the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, against which we are powerless. To serve with honour is the rule the Web commands us to follow. A spinner must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But faithful we stay."

"A prohibition imposed by the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, against which we are powerless. To serve with honour is the rule the Web commands us to follow. A spinner must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But faithful we stay."

languages.text: "Ein Verbot, das {mf|vom Lord|von der Lady} der Arche auferlegt wurde und gegen das wir machtlos sind. Mit Ehre zu dienen, das ist die Regel, die uns das Netz zu befolgen befiehlt. Ein Spinner muss auf eine jede nur erdenkliche Prüfung seines Glaubens vorbereitet sein. Es ist schwer. Aber wir wahren den Glauben."
languages.original_text: "A prohibition imposed by the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, against which we are powerless. To serve with honour is the rule the Web commands us to follow. A spinner must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But faithful we stay."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Verbot, das {mf|vom Lord|von der Lady} der Arche auferlegt wurde und gegen das wir machtlos sind. Mit Ehre zu dienen, das ist die Regel, die uns das Netz zu befolgen befiehlt. Ein Spinner muss auf eine jede nur erdenkliche Prüfung seines Glaubens vorbereitet sein. Es ist schwer. Aber wir wahren den Glauben."

languages.text: «Una prohibición impuesta por {mf|el señor|la señora} del Arca frente a la que somos impotentes. La Red nos conmina a servir con honor. Los tejedores debemos estar preparados para toda prueba de fe. Es difícil, pero nos mantenemos fieles».
languages.original_text: "A prohibition imposed by the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, against which we are powerless. To serve with honour is the rule the Web commands us to follow. A spinner must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But faithful we stay."

traits.locale_text: «Una prohibición impuesta por {mf|el señor|la señora} del Arca frente a la que somos impotentes. La Red nos conmina a servir con honor. Los tejedores debemos estar preparados para toda prueba de fe. Es difícil, pero nos mantenemos fieles».

languages.text: 「箱庭の主人によって貸された禁忌、それに対して我らは無力だ。名誉ある奉仕こそがウェブが我らに命じた規則なのだ。織り手は信仰を試される覚悟が必要だ。簡単なことではない。だが、我らは忠実であり続ける」
languages.original_text: "A prohibition imposed by the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, against which we are powerless. To serve with honour is the rule the Web commands us to follow. A spinner must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But faithful we stay."

traits.locale_text: 「箱庭の主人によって貸された禁忌、それに対して我らは無力だ。名誉ある奉仕こそがウェブが我らに命じた規則なのだ。織り手は信仰を試される覚悟が必要だ。簡単なことではない。だが、我らは忠実であり続ける」

languages.text: “既然这是方舟之主的禁令，那我们无能为力，必须服从。根据织血罗网的教义，我们必须心怀荣耀，侍奉主人。织网者必须时刻做好准备，面对信仰的考验。尽管这很困难，但我们会保持坚定。”
languages.original_text: "A prohibition imposed by the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, against which we are powerless. To serve with honour is the rule the Web commands us to follow. A spinner must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But faithful we stay."

traits.locale_text: “既然这是方舟之主的禁令，那我们无能为力，必须服从。根据织血罗网的教义，我们必须心怀荣耀，侍奉主人。织网者必须时刻做好准备，面对信仰的考验。尽管这很困难，但我们会保持坚定。”

languages.text: « Un interdit imposé par {mf|le seigneur|la maîtresse} de l'Arche, et contre lequel nous sommes impuissants. Servir avec honneur, telle est la règle que la Toile nous ordonne d'observer. Un tisseur doit toujours être prêt à mettre sa foi à l'épreuve. C'est difficile, mais nous restons fidèles à la voie qui est la nôtre. »
languages.original_text: "A prohibition imposed by the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, against which we are powerless. To serve with honour is the rule the Web commands us to follow. A spinner must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But faithful we stay."

traits.locale_text: « Un interdit imposé par {mf|le seigneur|la maîtresse} de l'Arche, et contre lequel nous sommes impuissants. Servir avec honneur, telle est la règle que la Toile nous ordonne d'observer. Un tisseur doit toujours être prêt à mettre sa foi à l'épreuve. C'est difficile, mais nous restons fidèles à la voie qui est la nôtre. »

languages.text: "Ark'ın {mf|Lordu|Leydisi} tarafından dayatılan bir yasak ki karşısında hiçbir gücümüz yok. Onurla hizmet etmek, Ağ'ın uymamızı emrettiği kuraldır. Bir dokur, inancının tabi tutulacağı tüm testlere hazırlıklı olmalıdır. Zor olsa da inancımız mutlaktır."
languages.original_text: "A prohibition imposed by the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, against which we are powerless. To serve with honour is the rule the Web commands us to follow. A spinner must be prepared for any test of their faith. It is difficult. But faithful we stay."
